revisionDesc.change: Added via github because the file was stuck in finalization in the editor.

div.p: Apollonios to Demetrios, greeting. The king has given instructions that nativ timber, namely acacia, tamarisk, and willow, should be felled to provide th breastwork for the 'long ships'. On reading this letter you will therefore take with you the basilikoi grammateis, the chief of police, the investigators, an the ... and [collect] labourers for felling to the number of 500 - the require contingent on the spot. [Do not neglect this matter, but] expeditiously com plete your quota [by ... or], failing that, at the latest by Choiak 15. [See tha the wood is...] and serviceable for its purpose. - The king has ordered it respect of this quota - to carry out the survey - Translation: R.S. Bagnall - P. Derow, Hellenistic Period, no. 119

listBibl.bibl: R.S. Bagnall - P. Derow, Hellenistic Period, no. 119
